text: Patrice Dominguez (12 January 1950 – 12 April 2015) was a French tennis player. He was born in Algiers, Algeria.ATP World Tour profile He represented France in the Davis Cup between 1971 and 1979.Davis Cup profile He then became a trainer for several players such as Henri Leconte and Fabrice Santoro. He also worked as an analyst for different French media. Between 2005 and 2011 he was the national technical director of the French Tennis Federation.Patrice Dominguez a été démis de ses fonctions Dominguez died on 12 April 2015 from lung disease at the age of 65. ==References== Category:1950 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Deaths from lung disease Category:French tennis players Category:Sportspeople from Algiers
title: Patrice Dominguez
